Name: Altrincham Library
Notes: Altrincham Library will be moving to the new Health and Wellbeing Centre on Market Street towards the end of 2018.

Name: Coppice Library
Notes: Coppice Library and Wellbeing Centre is managed in partnership with blueSCI.

Name: Lostock Library
Notes: Lostock Library is no longer part of Trafford's Statutory Library service and is now run by Lostock College.

Name: Sale Library
Notes: Sale Library also contains the Trafford Local Studies Centre.

Name: Timperley Library (temporary location)
Address: Riddings Community Centre, 121 Park Road, Timperley
Notes: The Timperley Library site (Park Road/Baker Street) will be redeveloped to facilitate a GP surgery, a new smaller library and some residential accommodation.

Name: Trafford Local Studies Centre
Notes: Trafford Local Studies is located within Sale Library at Sale Waterside.

Name: Trafford Town Hall Library
Address: Ground Floor, Trafford Town Hall, Talbot Road, Stretford
